Translations.Text: Imed$al, a nnegr nnsen
Wid, mara d ktilen ar medden, peeppimen taceot
Wanag, nitni, mara ktilen ne$ wezznen, ssenqasen
Wigi, day ur uminen ar aten id ssekren
ass ameqwoaean
Ass ideg ara bedden medden, zdat Mass imavalen
Xaii! War ccekk, imcumen, di Siooin ara ppujerrden
Siooin, w ara k t imlen
D tazmamt ipwanesxen
Assen, a nnegr inekkaoen
Wid iskiddiben ass iqeiiiyen
I t inekkoen, siwa amaaui amednub

Xaii! Maca dubben wulawen nnsen seg wayen kesben
Xaii! Assen, war ccekk, ad eeurrmen i Mass nnsen
Sinna, deg u$ud ara o$en
Sinna, ad pwanecden: "atan wacu tnekkoem
Xaii! S tidep, ar di Ailiyun, ayen ippujerden i iaaoviyen

D tazmamt ipwanesxen

F imieoeen, ssikiden
A pwaliv deg udmawen nnsen, ticci isaadiyen

cmaa ines d lmesk, f ayagi ad meizwiren wid ippemeizwiren

D tala ideg tessen iqoiben
Ih, wid ibe$wven llan ppavuan deg wid iumnen
Ppem$emmazen mara ten mmagren
Mi zzin ar twaculin nnsen, tezzin, ppuraren
Mara ten walin, ad inin: "s tidep, wigi nnetlafen
Ur d pwaznen ara $uosen, a ten aassen
